name: Joygift
description: JoyGift is a decentralized NFT gifting platform built on the Nervos CKB blockchain, leveraging the RGB++ protocol to enable secure and scalable digital asset interactions within the Bitcoin ecosystem. Designed to enhance user engagement through gamified and social features, JoyGift allows users to create, send, and receive unique NFTs as gifts, fostering community-driven experiences. Integrated with CKB’s Proof-of-Work (PoW) and Cell model, JoyGift supports seamless interoperability with Bitcoin-native wallets like JoyID, Unisat, and OKX. Backed by the CKB Eco Fund, JoyGift aims to redefine digital gifting by combining the security of CKB’s Layer 1 with innovative NFT use cases, contributing to the growth of decentralized applications (dApps) in the Nervos ecosystem.

highlights.title: NFT Gifting Platform
highlights.description: Enables users to create and exchange unique NFTs as gifts, enhancing social and gamified interactions within the CKB ecosystem

highlights.title: RGB++ Protocol Integration
highlights.description: Built on the RGB++ Layer, JoyGift ensures secure, scalable, and Bitcoin-compatible NFT transactions without relying on cross-chain bridges

related.title: Philosopher's Stone
related.desc: The first DOB-based NFT collection on Nervos.

faq.q: What are the use cases for JoyGift’s NFTs?
faq.a: JoyGift’s NFTs can be used for social gifting, community engagement, collectibles, or tokenized rewards, supporting diverse applications within the CKB ecosystem.
JoyGift uses CKB’s PoW consensus and Cell model, combined with RGB++, to facilitate secure NFT creation and gifting, integrated with Bitcoin-native wallets for seamless transactions
